structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.text: Public offices in counties containing a city of any class may close any one (1) full day of any week, or any two (2) half days Monday through Saturday of any week.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 253, sec. 1. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 31, sec. 1, effective June 16, 1960. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 1. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 157, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3766a.
